In England, in the seven days to 17 July, there were 297,804 new confirmed cases (529.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 July, there were 197,592 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 51% (100,212 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 July is 4,886,612 (8,681.6 cases per 100,000 population).
